original_text: And upon the top of the pillars was lily work: so was the work of the pillars finished.
korean_text: 그 두 기둥 꼭대기에는 백합화 형상이 있더라 두 기둥의 공사가 끝나니라

sentences.original_text: And upon the top of the pillars was lily work
sentences.korean_translation: 기둥 꼭대기에는 백합 모양 조각이 있었고

sentences.original_text: so was the work of the pillars finished
